title: Pixel 3a. How to silence and vibrate without notifications vibrating.
content: I just got Pixel 3a. I always keep notifications silent, no vibration, just a notification on top bar. However, when I put the phone in vibration mode, it allows all the notifications to vibrate. How do I make my phone vibrate only for calls but not messages? This is very weird I have never had this problem with other phones. How does vibration mode override my "no vibration" choice? I just don't want my kids to wake up to a call, then I start buzzing all the time.
category: Setting up and Personalizing your Device, Google Pixel 3a
